thread.section_title: Cristoforo Colombo Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Desgusting breakfest
thread.title_full: Desgusting breakfest - Review of Cristoforo Colombo Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: eduardgabriellazar
title: Desgusting breakfest
text: Not a four star hotel, the room was ok, decent, but the staff was very unfriendly, food disgusting, very dirty at the breakfast, very ditry glaces,curtlery dirty, very cheap ingrediends, horible food, the eggs taste was very bad, nothing good to eat. What I hated the most is that in Rome, we had to pay a very big city tax for a hotel of 2 stars in reality not 4!
